title: Elise Q rework is secretly a synergistic buff to Cassiopeia.

replies.body: twitch doesn't poison, its a plague, a virus and doesn't work with cass

> [{quoted}](name=ImTheSideKick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KrEkoF16,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-08T07:56:56.315+0000)
>
> twitch doesn't poison, its a plague, a virus and doesn't work with cass

Yes it does, its a poison and it reduces Cassiopeia's E cd

Toxic team:
Singed top
Elise jungle
Cass mid
Twitch ADC
Teemo support

> [{quoted}](name=Icestar1186,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KrEkoF16,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-10T16:29:33.856+0000)
>
> Toxic team:
> Singed top
> Elise jungle
> Cass mid
> Twitch ADC
> Teemo support

How to make a truly "toxic" team haha .
ddont think it will make elise / cassio duoq top tier .

It won't but if a Cassiopeia gets a gank from her Elise jungler it would boost her kill potential with free Twin Fang resets. Elise's Q is a targetted ability so it will hardly ever miss unless you misclick.
yes its just a help to te brain dead first time cassio who cant hit a single q

Or they could be playing against an Ahri?
Fizz?
Ekko?
Yasuo?
A Zed who got fed by roaming?
Plenty of counters to Cass tbh.

Cass is not freelo/OP or a safe pick, she's only "easy" given the right match-up - immobile mages - (not Cho'Gath) which are Xerath, Malzahar, Swain, Vel'Koz, Syndra etc.
